Plot: Mary Surratt is the lone female charged as a co-conspirator in the assassination trial of Abraham Lincoln. As the whole nation turns against her, she is forced to rely on her reluctant lawyer to uncover the truth and save her life.
Title: The Conspirator
Writer: James D. Solomon, James D. Solomon (story), Gregory Bernstein (story)
Actors: James McAvoy, Robin Wright, Kevin Kline, Evan Rachel Wood
tomatoConsensus: The Conspirator is well cast and tells a worthy story, but many viewers will lack the patience for Redford's deliberate, stagebound approach.
